ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Another Question
ygData.msgSnippet: You cannot do this legally.  You are required to have a unique CD key for each account, and a unique account for each player, or you violate copyright laws.
ygData.messageBody:
You cannot do this legally.  You are required to have a unique CD key for each account, and a unique account for each player, or you violate copyright laws.  Additionally, you can't have two characters from the same account online at the same time (legally).
 
Best Regards,
Aelwesara Cuthalion
----- Original Message -----
From: Brangvyne Accampo
To: EQ_women@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, December 06, 2002 4:48 PM
Subject: [EQ_women] Another Question

Salutations All!

Does anyone know if I have two computers in my house
with seperate axcess to EQ if I could run the same
copy of EQ on both? Assuming I have access for both to
the internet at the same time which I dont but soon
will could I run the same copy of EQ at the same time
and have two characters online controled by two
people? Or, would I have to have two paid accounts to
do this?

Just wondering if anyone might know the answer to
that. If no one knows the answer for sure does anyone
have any suggestions of places to start looking for an
answer, or who I should contact?

:o)
Bran
